title: Sign of enthalpy + entropy change - heating curve

content.question: At 1.0 atm a sample of ice is heated to liquid water and then to water vapor. The heating curve is shown in the graph above. Which of the following lists the signs for the changes in enthalpy and entropy for the process corresponding to segment X, going from left to right?

skill.text: 6.F: Explain the connection between experimental results and chemical concepts, processes, or theories.
